release.module-fancy: A set of VA-API based elements for GStreamer

intro.p: The GStreamer team is proud to announce the fifth bugfix release in the stable 1.10 release series of your favourite cross-platform multimedia framework!
This release only contains bugfixes and it is safe to update from 1.10.x.
See &site;/releases/1.10/ for the full release notes.

bug.summary: Using vaapih265enc without h265parse causes assert
Fails to build with uClibc C library
Fix " Reporting bugs " section in README
Backport meson build definitions to the 1.10 branch
encoder: vp9: doesn't compile with gcc 7
